name: vscode-ibmi-walkthroughs
description: Adds walkthroughs for IBM i development in VS Code

walkthroughs.title: Getting started with Code for IBM i
walkthroughs.description: Get started with what you need to write code with Code for IBM i.

steps.title: Connect to an IBM i
steps.description: Connect to an IBM i using the button in the Code for IBM i panel

steps.title: Open a source file
steps.description: Opening a source file is key. Source files contain a list of editable source members.

steps.title: Manage your library list
steps.description: Before you can compile any source code, you need to make sure the library list is correct. Try and add an item to your library list!

steps.title: Set your current library
steps.description: It's also possible to set your current library. You should make sure that it is correct!

steps.title: Compiling code
steps.description: Now we can open code and know how to manage the library list, it's time to compile some code!

walkthroughs.title: Code for IBM i Actions
walkthroughs.description: Actions are the way to manage your compile options. You can add, remove, and edit actions. You have to be connected first!

steps.title: View actions
steps.description: There is a special window you can use to view your actions.

steps.title: Add an action
steps.description: You can add an action by clicking the button in the Code for IBM i panel.

steps.title: Run an action
steps.description: You can run an action by using a shortcut when you have code open.

steps.title: Run an action from a panel
steps.description: You can run actions without opening any code.

walkthroughs.title: Code for IBM i IFS Browser
walkthroughs.description: The IFS Browser is a way to browse IFS files. You can use it to browse your IFS files and folders.

steps.title: Using the IFS Browser
steps.description: What you need to know when using the IFS Browser

steps.title: Change the working directory
steps.description: Change your home directory will allow you to work with more files

steps.title: IFS Browser Tips
steps.description: Just a couple of additional tips for using the IFS Browser

walkthroughs.title: Code for IBM i Tips
walkthroughs.description: Some tips for using Code for IBM i

steps.title: Source comparison
steps.description: You can compare two sources with simple right click options.

steps.title: Run SQL inline
steps.description: You can run SQL queries directly from files with the SQL extension.

steps.title: Search source members
steps.description: You can search the content of source members easily.

steps.title: RPGLE content-assist
steps.description: Did you know Code for IBM i provides content-assist for RPG?
